companyRequirements.requirement: Accessible space was a consideration in choosing office or made minor changes to make it more accessible
Have tried to de-bias your job descriptions
Have at least one non-man involved in your interview process
Have at least one executive supported ERG for a marginalized group in tech or equivalent
Have conducted anti-bias and/or other diversity training
Provide training for managers who don't have precious people management experience
Look outside the 'traditional' CS talent pool for developers
Banned 'culture fit' as a reason not to hire someone
Have a rubric or similar structure for your interview process
Have an HR professional on staff at least part time or a plan to have one soon
